summary: Tested badge milestone notification feature. All 12 backend API tests passed for GET /api/badges/milestones, POST /api/badges/milestones/acknowledge, and GET /api/badges/share/{user_id}. Frontend MilestoneProvider and MilestoneNotificationModal components are properly integrated in the root layout. Registration and authentication flow works correctly.

issues: Modal only shows when user has new (unacknowledged achieved) milestones. For new users with 0 badges, no modal appears as expected since there are no achieved milestones to show.

critical_code_review_comments: MilestoneNotificationModal was missing data-testid attributes - added testID='milestone-notification-modal', testID='milestone-share-button', testID='milestone-continue-button' for testing
MilestoneContext correctly auto-checks for milestones on authentication and queues new milestones for display
checkForNewMilestones is correctly called after listing creation (post/index.tsx) and after mark-sold (my-listings.tsx)
All milestone types (count-based: 1, 5, 10, 25, 50 and special: First Listing, First Sale, Active Seller, Top Seller, Trusted Member, Veteran) are properly defined in backend
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test users for milestone API testing via registration
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend milestone APIs are fully working. Frontend MilestoneProvider is in root layout and auto-checks for milestones. Modal shows with confetti animation when user achieves milestones (earns badges). To test modal appearance, user needs to: 1) Create a listing (triggers 'First Listing' badge and milestone), 2) Mark item as sold (triggers 'First Sale' badge and milestone), or 3) Earn 5+ badges for count-based milestones.
rca_of_the_issue: N/A - No issues found. All features working as expected.
